metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5209 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In NetHack before 3.6.5, unknown options starting with -de and -i can cause a buffer overflow resulting in a crash or remote code execution/privilege escalation. This vulnerability affects systems that have NetHack installed suid/sgid and shared systems that allow users to influence command line options. Users should upgrade to NetHack 3.6.5.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Nethack is installed sgid games, but not suid or sgid root.

criterions.comment: nethack package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
